text: Jeffrey "Jeff" Young (born March 31, 1962) is an American guitarist. He is best known for having played guitar for Megadeth, a thrash metal band. He played on the album So Far, So Good... So What!. == Music == * 1988, Megadeth – So Far, So Good... So What!. * 1998, Badi Assad – Chameleon * 2003, It Runs in the Family (Soundtrack) * 2010, Jeff Young – Equilibrium (Solo) * 2013, Jeff Young – "Monsoon" (Solo single from Revolutions album) * 2020, Jeff Young – "In the Flesh" (Solo single from Revolutions album) * 2020, Jeff Young – "Slow Burn" (Solo single from Revolutions album) Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Megadeth members Category:American guitarists
title: Jeff Young
